columns.name: ORG_RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the organ record.

columns.name: PANC_PROC_TEAM_C_NAME
columns.description: The relationship between the pancreas procurement team and the process/infusion team.

columns.name: ISLET_PROC_CENTER_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the relationship between islet processing/testing center and transplant center

columns.name: PROC_CENTER_OTHER
columns.description: The free text islet processing facility.

columns.name: COLL_TYPE_OTHER
columns.description: Free text collagenase type.

columns.name: ISLET_PU_OTHER
columns.description: Free text islet purification information.

columns.name: DEN_GRAD_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description: The density gradient method for islet purification.

columns.name: DEN_GRAD_METHOD_OTH
columns.description: The free text density gradient method.

columns.name: ISLET_PRETRT_OTHER
columns.description: Free text islet pretreatment.

columns.name: TIME_OF_EQUV_CNT_C_NAME
columns.description: When the islet equivalent count occurred.

columns.name: TIME_EQUV_CNT_OTHER
columns.description: Free text for when the islet equivalent count occurred.

columns.name: INFUSION_START_DTTM
columns.description: The start time of the islet infusion.

columns.name: RESULT_GRAM_STAIN_C_NAME
columns.description: The gram stain microbiology result.

columns.name: RESULT_AEROB_CULT_C_NAME
columns.description: The aerobic culture microbiology result.

columns.name: RESULT_ANAER_CULT_C_NAME
columns.description: The anaerobic culture microbiology result.

columns.name: RESULT_FUNG_CULT_C_NAME
columns.description: The fungal culture microbiology result.

columns.name: RESULT_MYCOPLASMA_C_NAME
columns.description: The mycoplasma microbiology result.

columns.name: ENDOTOXIN_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: The unit for the total endotoxin in the final preparation.

columns.name: ISLET_VIAB_TEST_C_NAME
columns.description: The islet viability test that was applied.

columns.name: VIAB_TEST_OTHER
columns.description: Free text for the islet viability test used.

columns.name: STIMULATION_IDX
columns.description: The stimulation index.

columns.name: PULM_USED_C_NAME
columns.description: Whether pulmozyme was used during islet processing.

columns.name: INFUSION_TOTAL_TIME
columns.description: The total duration of the islet infusion.

columns.name: CULTURE_PRETRT_DUR
columns.description: The duration of culture pretreatment.

columns.name: ISOLATION_NUM
columns.description: The isolation number.

columns.name: NUM_OF_ISLET_EQUV
columns.description: The total number of islet equivalents (IEQ).

columns.name: PACKED_CELL_VOL
columns.description: The packed cell volume in mL.

columns.name: TOTAL_ENDOTOXIN_U
columns.description: The total number of endotoxin units in final preparation.

columns.name: VIAB_RESULTS
columns.description: The percentage of viability results.

columns.name: ISOLATION_DATE
columns.description: The date of isolation.

columns.name: PANC_PROC_TEAM_INFO
columns.description: The free text pancreas procurement team.
